snippet: Tony Stewart, the defending Nascar Sprint Cup champion, made a bold move to take the lead on a late restart and held off Jimmie Johnson on Sunday at Las Vegas Motor Speedway.
abstract: Defending Nascar Sprint Cup champion Tony Stewart wins Kobalt Tools 400 auto race at Las Vegas Motor Speedway.
lead_paragraph: Tony Stewart, the defending Nascar Sprint Cup champion, made a bold move to take the lead on a late restart and held off Jimmie Johnson on Sunday at Las Vegas Motor Speedway.

headline.main: Stewart’s Late Move Earns Win at Las Vegas
